function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of COVID-19 due to lack of understanding of design factors and their impacts.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission in built environments.","Mitigation":"Improving understanding of design factors and their impacts on transmission risk, implementing preventive measures.","Technologies":"Occupancy simulation, data analytics, environmental sensors.","People":"Occupants, building designers, facility managers.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities."}]}
